thread.title: Mobile operator Salt to enter Swiss fixed-line business

title: Mobile operator Salt to enter Swiss fixed-line business
text: March 20, 2018 / 10:01 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago Mobile operator Salt to enter Swiss fixed-line business Reuters Staff 1 Min Read ZURICH (Reuters) - Swiss telecoms operator Salt Mobile will enter the Swiss fixed-line market with technology partner Swiss Fibre Net, the unit of French company Iliad ( ILD.PA ) said on Tuesday. FILE PHOTO - The logo of Swiss mobile telecommunications operator Salt. is pictured in a shop in the company headquarters in Renens near Lausanne, Switzerland, April 24, 2015. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse Salt, rebranded from Orange in 2015, already competes with network operators Swisscom ( SCMN.S ) and Sunrise Communications ( SRCG.S ) in the Swiss mobile market. Swiss Fibre Net is a joint venture of local energy providers in Switzerland. Reporting by Michael Shields; Editing by John Miller
